description:
The soul of a powder ski with all-mountain design. The Lotus line from DPS is made for skiers who live for the float. The 124 Pagoda has a forward mount, plus a flex pattern and sidecut built for mixed conditions and lighter days. Powder days are definitely not discounted – Spoon Technology in the shovel, Paddle Tech sidecut and Pagoda carbon construction adds great off-edge control so you can go for glory in the deep stuff, too.

  • Pagoda carbon sandwich construction is light, torsionally stiff, and powerful
  • Improved dampness and smoothness makes the ski ask for more speed even when the conditions gets choppy
  • Pure aerospace prepreg carbon fiber laminate and nanotech technology for durability and power
  • Ash wood core for reduced chatter and strength
  • Textured nylon top sheet
  • UHMW (PTex) sidewalls
  • Wide profile Rockwell 48 steel edges
  • DPS spoon technology features shovel convexity, a flat-running surface and square tail for increased control over turn shape, ability to easily mine speed across the fall line and superior off-edge control
  • Paddle tech sidecut is tapered, with flatter sections that blend at the contact points to make it a smooth, smooth driver
  • World Cup Race base keeps you in line with the pros
name: DPS Skis Lotus 124 Pagoda Skis - Unisex
